data.name: Heavy Metal Machines - Ultimate Machine Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Ultimate Machine Pack of Heavy Metal Machines unlocks 17 vehicles permanently to your account.

Ranging from a car crushing Monster Truck and a heavy armored Tank to a blade thrower Motorcycle and a magnetic Tow Truck, each of the many vehicles has a different set of weapons and gameplay styles that bring a wide range of strategic possibilities to each match.

Check out the list of characters:

  • Artificer
  • Black Lotus
  • Clunker
  • Dirt Devil
  • Full Metal Judge
  • Icebringer
  • Killer J.
  • Little Monster
  • Metal Herald
  • Peacemaker
  • Photon
  • Rampage
  • Stargazer
  • Stingray
  • Vulture
  • Wildfire
  • Windrider

The Ultimate Machine Pack of Heavy Metal Machines unlocks 17 vehicles permanently to your account.

Ranging from a car crushing Monster Truck and a heavy armored Tank to a blade thrower Motorcycle and a magnetic Tow Truck, each of the many vehicles has a different set of weapons and gameplay styles that bring a wide range of strategic possibilities to each match.

data.short_description: Unlock 17 vehicles in Heavy Metal Machines and live the complete experience in this post-apocalyptic world of deadly machines and epic battles.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Polish, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA graphics card with at least 512 MB video ram and Shader Model 3.0 support. (NVIDIA GT 710, AMD Radeon R5 240)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.3+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA graphics card with 1024 MB+ video ram and Shader Model 3.0+ support. (NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7750)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
